name: Taco Box (3 Tacos)
description: Your choice of any three delicious tacos, served as a complete meal with savory Mexican rice and black beans.

name: Carne Asada Taco
description: Tender grilled steak, chopped and served on a warm corn tortilla, topped with fresh cilantro and onion.

name: Shrimp Taco
description: Juicy grilled shrimp served on a warm corn tortilla, topped with fresh pico de gallo and a creamy chipotle aioli.

name: Fish Taco
description: Crispy, beer-battered fried fish on a warm corn tortilla, topped with pico de gallo and a creamy chipotle aioli.

name: Al Pastor Taco
description: Traditional marinated pork, slow-roasted on a vertical spit, served on a warm corn tortilla with cilantro, onion, and a slice of pineapple.

name: Carnitas Taco
description: Tender, slow-cooked shredded pork with crispy edges, served on a warm corn tortilla and topped with cilantro and onion.

name: Chicken Tinga Taco
description: Flavorful shredded chicken stewed in a smoky chipotle-tomato sauce, served on a warm corn tortilla with cilantro and onion.

name: Veggies Taco
description: A fresh and healthy taco with sautéed bell peppers and onions, served on a warm corn tortilla and topped with cilantro.

name: Carne Asada Burrito/Bowl
description: A hearty portion of grilled steak served in a warm flour tortilla or a bowl with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheese.

name: Shrimp Burrito/Bowl
description: Juicy grilled shrimp served in a warm flour tortilla or a bowl with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheese.

name: Fish Burrito/Bowl
description: Crispy fried fish served in a warm flour tortilla or a bowl with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheese.

name: Al Pastor Burrito/Bowl
description: Savory marinated pork and pineapple served in a warm flour tortilla or a bowl with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheese.

name: Carnitas Burrito/Bowl
description: Tender, slow-cooked shredded pork served in a warm flour tortilla or a bowl with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheese.

name: Chicken Tinga Burrito/Bowl
description: Smoky shredded chicken tinga served in a warm flour tortilla or a bowl with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheese.

name: Veggies Burrito/Bowl
description: Sautéed bell peppers and onions served in a warm flour tortilla or a bowl with rice, beans, lettuce, pico de gallo, and cheese.

name: Chips and Salsa
description: A basket of fresh, crispy tortilla chips served with our signature house-made tomato salsa.

name: Chips and Guacamole
description: A basket of fresh, crispy tortilla chips served with a generous portion of our house-made guacamole, made with fresh avocados.

name: Elote
description: Classic Mexican street corn on the cob, grilled and coated with mayonnaise, cotija cheese, chili powder, and a squeeze of lime.

name: Rice
description: A side of our fluffy, savory Mexican-style rice.

name: Beans
description: A side of our perfectly seasoned, slow-simmered black beans.

name: Rice and Beans
description: A classic side combination of our savory Mexican rice and seasoned black beans.

name: Jarritos
description: An authentic Mexican fruit-flavored soda in a glass bottle. Ask for available flavors like Mandarin, Tamarind, or Lime.

name: Mexican Coke
description: Coca-Cola made with real cane sugar, served in its iconic glass bottle for a classic, crisp taste.

name: Topo Chico
description: A refreshing, bubbly mineral water from Mexico, known for its crisp carbonation.

name: Water
description: A simple bottle of purified spring water.

name: Coke
description: The classic, refreshing taste of Coca-Cola served from the fountain.

name: Diet Coke
description: The crisp, refreshing taste of Diet Coke with zero calories, served from the fountain.

name: Sprite
description: A crisp, clean, caffeine-free lemon-lime soda served from the fountain.

name: Churros
description: A classic Mexican dessert of fried dough pastry, coated in cinnamon sugar and served warm.
